title: Are there any esoteric books on human biology? - Quora

response.answer_text: 1. "secret [occult] philosophy", Agrippa of Nettesheim in a conversation about esoteric literature, it is simply impossible to ignore the work of Agrippa of Nettesheim (real name: Henry Cornelius of Nettesheim). His work "the secret [occult] philosophy" made an indelible impression on the Tarot reader of Eliphas Levi, who coined the term "occultism" into wide use. 2. "the Art of dreaming", Carlos Castaneda Carlos Castaneda was born in Peru and became world-famous for his work in the field of occult knowledge. His books quickly became bestsellers and to this day occupy places of honor in the lists of literature, mandatory reading for those who want to learn the secrets of esotericism. 3. "the Power of light", Nicholas Roerich Nicholas Roerich is one of the few extraordinarily gifted people whose name is a landmark in quite, it would seem, different areas. Roerich was a famous traveler, archaeologist, writer, artist, and mystic philosopher. This talented Russian scientist (persecuted by the Soviet authorities) spent many years in the East, where he became familiar with ancient teachings. It is important to note that Roerich's paintings help many people during their meditations. Written by him, the heavens and mountains (iridescent with delicate shades of purple, cool lilac and hot fiery flowers) help the beholder to feel something sublime, pure, otherworldly. 4. " Awareness. The keys to living in emotional balance", Ragnisco Osho – spiritual leader of India, an inspiration, a preacher, a mystic, an enlightened one. The author's real name is Chandra Mohan Jain, but he is better known around the world as Osho Rajneesh. 5. "transerfing reality", Vadim Zeland Transerfing is a new technique for managing events in life the way you need. The author claims that it can be used to do the impossible. And offers a different view of reality based on a special model of different options. Transerfing is the way of the magician, which in principle is every person, just does not know about it. Find out with this technique that you are the magician of your life. Open yourself up to hitherto unknown possibilities. Make your reality the one you've always dreamed of!

This is an interesting question that hinges on the definition of “esoteric.” If you take esoteric to mean information that is known to just a small group of people then most advanced biological science is esoteric and you could find many books in academic libraries about the subject. If on the other hand, you mean a mystical, occult type of system there are almost certainly many books from earlier times that would meet your needs. Most early biological theories were based on Aristotle and definitely have that type of bend.
